scripts.regenerate-and-run:python:transactional: rm -rf swagger-out/transactional-python && npm run generate:python:transactional && source utils/sdk/python/venv/bin/activate && cd swagger-out/transactional-python/ && python setup.py install --force && pip install python-dotenv && cd ../../utils/sdk/python && python useTransactional.py && deactivate
scripts.regenerate-and-run:python:marketing: rm -rf swagger-out/marketing-python && npm run generate:python:marketing && source utils/sdk/python/venv/bin/activate && cd swagger-out/marketing-python/ && python setup.py install --force && pip install python-dotenv && cd ../../utils/sdk/python && python useMarketing.py && deactivate
scripts.regenerate-and-run:ruby:transactional: rm -rf swagger-out/transactional-ruby && npm run generate:ruby:transactional && cd utils/sdk/ruby && gem build ../../../swagger-out/transactional-ruby/MailchimpTransactional.gemspec && sudo gem install ../../../swagger-out/transactional-ruby/MailchimpTransactional-1.0.0.gem && sudo gem install dotenv && ruby useTransactional.rb
scripts.regenerate-and-run:ruby:marketing: rm -rf swagger-out/marketing-ruby && npm run generate:ruby:marketing && cd utils/sdk/ruby && gem build ../../../swagger-out/marketing-ruby/MailchimpMarketing.gemspec && sudo gem install ../../../swagger-out/marketing-ruby/MailchimpMarketing-1.0.0.gem && sudo gem install dotenv && ruby useMarketing.rb
